cards.name: Alioth
cards.ability: On Reveal: Remove the text from all unrevealed enemy characters here.

cards.name: Black Cat
cards.ability: End of Turn: Discard this from your hand.

cards.name: Electro
cards.ability: On Reveal: +1 max Energy. Ongoing: You can only play 1 card a turn.

cards.name: Leader
cards.ability: On Reveal: Copy the enemy card(s) with the highest Power played this turn, but on your side.

cards.name: Mercury
cards.ability: You can move this once. Ongoing: Enemy cards here can't move.

cards.name: Nakia
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give all cards in your hand +1 Power.

cards.name: Sauron
cards.ability: On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards in your deck.

cards.name: SP//dr
cards.ability: On Reveal: Merge this into one of your cards here. You can move that card next turn.

cards.name: Supergiant
cards.ability: On Reveal: All cards played next turn don't reveal until the game ends.

cards.name: X-23
cards.ability: When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location and you get +1 Energy next turn.

cards.name: Danger
cards.ability: Activate: Destroy an enemy card here with less Power.

cards.name: Spider-Man Noir
cards.ability: On Reveal: If your other cards in play cost exactly 8 total, add the top card of your deck here. Set its Power to 8. (0/8)

cards.name: Remote Mines
cards.ability: On Reveal: Afflict the 2 highest-Power enemy cards here with -2 Power.

cards.name: Vibro-Shock Gauntlets
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give your highest-Power card here +2 Power. You get +1 Energy next turn.

cards.name: Flight Harness
cards.ability: On Reveal: Give your highest-Power card here +1 Power and move it to the right.

cards.name: Prowler
cards.ability: On Reveal: Add 2 <mark>Thief’s Tools</mark> to your hand. Set their Costs to 0 if a card moved last turn.

cards.name: Spider-Punk
cards.ability: You can move this once. When this moves to a location, steal 2 Power from the highest-Power enemy there.

locations.name: Hospice
locations.ability: Changes to card Power are doubled here.

locations.name: Essex's Lab
locations.ability: After turn 4, destroy a card. Your others here split its Power.

items.title: GGWCS Qualifier #3
items: Watch the Golden Gauntlet matches live on Twitch!

items.title: Sanctum Showdown
items: This event features exciting new rewards including the brand new Skill card, The Hunger to keep feeding your Horde. This run of Sanctum Showdown will also include a new 7 day Premium Event Pass for 800 Gold which includes an exclusive variant and a BUNCH of bonus value.

items.title: Grand Arena
items: Return to the Grand Arena, featuring NEW champions including Magneto, Thor, Hulk, and Ghost-Spider. Fight for Glory and claim the new Zombie Sentry card and new Champion Variants as event rewards! This mode will also have a new Premium Event Pass for 800 Gold which includes another exclusive variant and more bonus value to help on your journey.

items.title: Featured Sets
items: Oct 15 - Oct 21 - Sanctum Showdown Picks
Oct 22 - Nov 1 - Dark Fantasy Variant Spotlight

items.name: Zombie Scarlet Witch
changes: 3/2 – After you play a card here, Horde +2.

items.name: Zombie Giant-Man
changes: 5/3 – On Reveal: Horde +1, then this gains Power equal to your Zombie Horde.
5/4 – On Reveal: Horde +2, then this gains Power equal to your Zombie Horde.

items.name: Invisible Woman First Steps
changes: 3/5 – Activate: This turn, your End of Turn abilities happen twice.

items.name: Shadow King
changes: 2/2 – On Reveal: Reset all cards here to their original Power.

items.name: Mobius M. Mobius
changes: 3/4 – Ongoing: Your Costs can’t be increased. Your opponent’s Costs can’t be reduced.

items.name: Rogue
changes: 3/2 – On Reveal: Steal the text from an enemy Ongoing card here.

items.name: Firelord
changes: 4/6 – On Reveal: Revive one of your discarded or destroyed 3-Cost cards here.

items.name: Warlock
changes: 3/3 – Activate: For each unspent Energy, give a card in your hand –1 Cost.

items.name: Black Cat
changes: 1/5 – End of Turn: Discard this from your hand.

items.name: Sauron
changes: 1/3 – On Reveal: Remove the abilities from all Ongoing cards in your deck.

items.name: Supergiant
changes: 4/7 – On Reveal: All cards played next turn don’t reveal until the game ends.

items.name: Alioth
changes: 6/9 – On Reveal: Remove the text from all unrevealed enemy characters here.

items.name: Mercury
changes: 2/2 – You can move this once. Ongoing: Enemy cards here can’t move.

items.name: X-23
changes: 1/2 – When this is discarded or destroyed, regenerate it at a random location and you get +1 Energy next turn.

items.name: Leader
changes: 6/4 – On Reveal: Copy the enemy card(s) with the highest Power played this turn, but on your side

items.name: Nakia
changes: 3/3 – On Reveal: Give all cards in your hand +1 Power.

items.name: Peni Parker’s SP//dr
changes: 3/4 – On Reveal: Merge this into one of your cards here. You can move that card next turn.

items.name: Electro
changes: 3/4 – On Reveal: +1 Max Energy. Ongoing: You can only play 1 card a turn.
